title: 2021 Week 8 Preview
itunes:title: 2021 Week 8 Preview
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal preview all the upcoming games starting with the primetime games. Can the Giants sneak out a win against the Chiefs? The draft kicks off and Dan talks about possibly skipping Gregg again in a huge spot. Come for the game previews, stay for the president height talk.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
